tool_description:
US Zipcode, County, City, and State Boundaries API:

A simple & very fast API that will allow you to integrate multiple GeoJson US boundaries results into your apps and systems.

This API is designed to be used programatically for optimal performance.  When using the MashApe UI for queries expect significant latency issues on large result sets!
name: boundaries-io
title: boundaries-io

api_list.name: Get Census Tract By Location
api_list.description: Retrieve Census Tract by Location

api_list.name: Get Census Tract by GeoId
api_list.description: Get Census Tract by GeoId
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/censustract/01011952201"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/censustract/{geoid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query for  State Boundaries
api_list.description: Query for State Boundary. this will return a simpler GeoJson representation of the State, and will not include zip codes only counties that make up that state as feature properties

api_list.name: [Depreciated] Query by Zipcodes Boundaries
api_list.description: Query by Zipcodes Boundaries

api_list.name: (MEGA PLAN ONLY)Query for DMA Region Area Boundary
api_list.description:
*MEGA Subscription required*
Query for Nielsen's DMA Region Boundary and metadata by DMA Name.
The metadata  data is publicly available from thevab.com  from URL  https://thevab.com/storage/app/media/Toolkit/DMA_Map_2019.pdf 
the boundaries were created internally in boundaries-io.com and the US census files.

The result includes all counties and zip codes in the DMA  region, with DMA Ranking from 2020 located here:
https://mediatracks.com/resources/nielsen-dma-rankings-2020/

For more granular data contact www.nielsen.com

api_list.name: Query by Zipcode(s) for zipcode bondaries
api_list.description: Get US State,Zipcode, or City boundaries

api_list.name: Query by a FIPS for Zipcode boundaries
api_list.description: FIPS county code. The FIPS county code is a five-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code (FIPS 6-4) which uniquely identifies counties and county equivalents in the United States.

api_list.name: Query by Radius(in miles) .for Zipcode boundaries
api_list.description: Get US zipcode boundaries that are contained within OR intersect the radius in miles of the point(latitude,longtitude).

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: radius size in miles. defaults to 1 mile.

optional_parameters.name: showCirlce
optional_parameters.description: show the bounding Circle in results or not.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: radius size in miles. defaults to 1 mile.

api_list.name: Query by Location for Zipcode boundaries
api_list.description: Search for a zipcode that intersect a location.

optional_parameters.name: showwithinpoint
optional_parameters.description: Show the location(lat,long) used as a GeoJsonPoint in results.
